snippet.title: Riptide GP®2 Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Riptide GP™2, the sequel to the only console quality watercross-racing game on mobile devices, kicks EVERYTHING into overdrive delivering intense online head-to-head multiplayer action, upgradable hydro jets, improved graphics, an all new stunting system, all new wave-filled tracks, and a full career mode. 

Suit up, push the throttle to the max and take the checkered flag against a sea of competitors!
